ARABIC: أَلَّا تَعْبُدُوٓا۟ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَ إِنَّنِى لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ وَبَشِيرٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: 'Do not worship anyone but Allah! I am a warner and bringer of good news to you from Him
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (Proclaiming) that you should worship none but God. Verily I bring to you from Him a message of warning and rejoicing,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: that you may worship none but Allah. Verily, I have come to you as a warner and a bearer of good news from Him
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (It teaches), "People, do not worship anyone besides God. I, (Muhammad), am His Messenger sent to warn you and to give you the glad news.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “That do not worship anyone except Allah; indeed I am for you a Herald of Warning and Glad Tidings, from Him.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (Saying) worship none but Allah. Verily, I (Muhammad) am unto you from Him a warner and a bringer of glad tidings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: That you shall not serve (any) but Allah; surely I am a warner for you from Him and a giver of good news,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Serve you none but God' (I am to you a warner from Him and a bearer of good tidings)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (Saying): Serve none but Allah. Lo! I am unto you from Him a warner and a bringer of good tidings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: [It teaches] that you should worship none but God. I am sent to you from Him to warn you and to give you good tidings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Saying: ye shall not worship ought except Allah. Verily I am unto you from Him a warner and a bearer of glad tidings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: declaring: ‘Worship no one but Allah. I am indeed a warner to you from Him and a bearer of good news.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (It teacheth) that ye should worship none but Allah. (Say): "Verily I am (sent) unto you from Him to warn and to bring glad tidings:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (Saying) worship none but Allah. Verily, I (Muhammad SAW) am unto you from Him a warner and a bringer of glad tidings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Worship none except Allah. I am for you, a warner sent from Him and a bearer of glad tidings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: That you shall worship none but God. “I am a warner to you from Him, and a bearer of good news.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Through a messenger, saying], "Do not worship except Allah. Indeed, I am to you from Him a warner and a bringer of good tidings,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [11:2] [Saying:] ‘Worship none but God. Truly I am to you a warner from Him, of chastisement, if you disbelieve, and a bearer of good tidings’, of reward, if you believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: ((Saying): Serve) declare the divine Oneness of (none but Allah. Lo! I am Unto you from Him) from Allah (a warner) from the Fire (and a bringer of good tidings) to enter Paradise.
